name: CreateNewRequester
description:
Create a new requester in Freshservice.

Use this tool to add a new requester to Freshservice whenever you need to register someone in the system.

parameters.name: requester_details
parameters.description: Details of the requester to be created, including name, email, phone numbers, department IDs, manager ID, and other optional attributes.

primary_email.description: Primary email address of the requester

secondary_emails.description: Secondary email addresses of the requester

work_phone_number.description: Work phone number of the requester

mobile_phone_number.description: Mobile phone number of the requester

department_ids.description: Unique IDs of the departments associated with the requester

can_see_all_tickets_from_associated_depa.description: Set to true if the requester must be allowed to view tickets filed by other members of the department, and false otherwise

reporting_manager_id.description: Unique identifier of the requester's reporting manager

location_id.description: Unique identifier of the location associated with the requester

active.description: true if the user is active, and false if the user account has been deactivated.

has_logged_in.description: true if the user has logged in to Freshservice at least once, and false otherwise.

created_time.description: Timestamp at which the requester was created

updated_time.description: Timestamp at which the requester was last modified

custom_fields.description: Custom fields that are associated with a Freshservice entity

value_schema.description: Requester who needs to be created

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.
